name: LiDAR Dungeon
description:
Fight enemies and collect upgrades as you traverse the depths of a procedurally-generated spaceship, seeing only that which your LiDAR reveals.

Requires Mouse/Touchpad + Keyboard to play.

Controls can be remapped by pressing ESC, then navigating to options. Press Z to toggle music.

Downloading the game is recommended for better performance and being able to play in fullscreen.

Credits:

  • Development: Wojciech Graj
  • Testing: Jan Czajka
  • Testing: Yahor Dauksha

Made in 7 days using the TIC-80 for the 7DRL2023 GameJam.

Source code and a write-up can be found here: https://github.com/wojciech-graj/LiDAR-Dungeon
